::: {.cell hash='2023-03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_2f97dea9914ee62a8a9d22baa66125c9'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(mistlecode)

options(scipen = 999)
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='2023-03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_5310764d02c0714c82d8fed690d65f48'}

```{.r .cell-code}
dt <- 
  readLines("input.txt") |>
  stringr::str_split("")

m <- matrix(unlist(dt), nrow = length(dt), byrow = TRUE)
```
:::


## Part 1

This was so much fun! I love dbscan with all my heart.


::: {.cell hash='2023-03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_7a8f0b5ee2025c05f426f88f18c33cc4'}

```{.r .cell-code}
dt <- m |> mistlecode::matrix_to_coords()
clust <-
  dt |>
  dplyr::filter(data != ".") |>
  dplyr::select(-data) |>
  dbscan::dbscan(sqrt(2), minPts = 2)
dt <- 
  dt |>
  dplyr::filter(data != ".") |>
  dplyr::mutate(clust = clust$cluster) |>
  dplyr::filter(any(!grepl('[0-9]', data)), .by = 'clust')
mistlecode::coords_to_matrix(dt$data, dt$row, dt$col) |>
  t() |>
  as.vector() |>
  paste0(collapse = "") |>
  str_replace_all('[^0-9]', ' ') |>
  str_split(' ') |>
  unlist() |>
  as.numeric() |>
  purrr::discard(is.na) |>
  sum(na.rm = TRUE)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 4361
```
:::
:::


## Part 2

This is really long-winded. I'm sure it could be better functionalized. The hard part wasn't as much figuring out what goes in a group as much as figuring out what goes in which group.


::: {.cell hash='2023-03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_47dc4f7f7fa62dfb274d0061ce85de99'}

```{.r .cell-code}
do_prod <- function(d) {
  dd <- d[d != '*']
  ifelse(length(dd) >= 2, prod(as.numeric(dd), na.rm = TRUE), d)
}
dt <- mistlecode::matrix_to_coords(m)
clust <-
  dt |>
  dplyr::filter(data != ".") |>
  dplyr::select(-data) |>
  dbscan::dbscan(sqrt(2), minPts = 2)
number_clust <-
  dt |>
  dplyr::filter(grepl('[0-9]', data)) |>
  dplyr::select(-data) |>
  dbscan::dbscan(1, minPts = 1)
number_dt <-
  dt |>
  dplyr::filter(grepl('[0-9]', data)) |>
  dplyr::mutate(number_clust = number_clust$cluster)
clust_dt <- 
  dt |>
  dplyr::filter(data != ".") |>
  dplyr::mutate(clust = clust$cluster) |>
  dplyr::left_join(number_dt, by = join_by(data, row, col)) |>
  dplyr::filter(any(!grepl('[0-9]', data)), .by = 'clust') |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    has_prod = any(data == '*') & length(unique(number_clust[!is.na(number_clust)])) == 2,
    prod_group = dplyr::cur_group_id(),
    .by = 'clust'
  ) |>
  dplyr::filter(grepl('[0-9]', data))
has_prod <-
  mistlecode::coords_to_matrix(clust_dt$prod_group, clust_dt$row, clust_dt$col) |>
  t() |>
  as.vector() |>
  data.frame() |>
  `colnames<-`('has_prod') |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    t = cumsum(is.na(has_prod))
  ) |>
  dplyr::filter(dplyr::row_number() == dplyr::n() & !is.na(has_prod), .by = 't') |>
  dplyr::pull(has_prod)
numbers <-
  mistlecode::coords_to_matrix(clust_dt$data, clust_dt$row, clust_dt$col) |>
  t() |>
  as.vector() |>
  paste0(collapse = "") |>
  str_replace_all('[^0-9]', ' ') |>
  str_split(' ') |>
  unlist() |>
  as.numeric() |>
  purrr::discard(is.na)

data.frame(
  has_prod,
  numbers
) |>
  dplyr::filter(dplyr::n() >= 2, .by = has_prod) |>
  dplyr::summarise(val = prod(numbers), .by = has_prod) |>
  dplyr::pull(val) |>
  sum()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 75519888
```
:::
:::
